## Properties

| Property           | Attribute           | Description           | Type                                         | Default     |
| ------------------ | ------------------- | --------------------- | -------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `class`            | `class`             | CSS Classes           | `string`                                     | `''`        |
| `grouped`          | `grouped`           | Grouped field         | `boolean`                                    | `false`     |
| `groupedMultiline` | `grouped-multiline` | Grouped, on multiline | `boolean`                                    | `false`     |
| `hasAddons`        | `has-addons`        | Has addons            | `boolean`                                    | `false`     |
| `horizontal`       | `horizontal`        | Horizontal field      | `boolean`                                    | `false`     |
| `label`            | `label`             | Label                 | `string`                                     | `undefined` |
| `message`          | `message`           | Help or error message | `string`                                     | `undefined` |
| `size`             | `size`              | Field size            | `"large" \| "medium" \| "normal" \| "small"` | `undefined` |
